name: AI Build
description:
If you can't play it because of your antivirus, Try The Web Version

This game is a game about where an AI can choose a template, while you can improve that template however you want! It's a sandbox

This game was made using Processing, a 2D and 3D game engine which is quite limiting.

It was made for the WOWIE Game Jam 4.0

Join the official Discord server to submit your levels, or view other levels.

For Linux or the LightWeight version, you'll need to download OpenJDK 17

Most antiviruses will mark this as a virus so here's the VirusTotal
